descriptionHtml:
CM Power Spells Mod
===================

Adds a merchant of magic items to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun who sells spell tomes that teach racial powers that can be cast like spells with magicka costs and only half the duration of normal powers to limit their use. 

The default Powers have not been changed or modified in any way.  They can still be used as they always have been.  But the majority of the racial powers can only be used once a day, which really limits the powers, and many people don\'t even use them anymore.  Shorter duration spells make a power actually work for  the player, makes a character more unique, increases the roleplaying, and will even have the player using his/her actual Racial Power more often.

Since all the spell tomes for the powers are for sale, there\'s nothing to prevent the player from buying them all if he/she has the gold. However, it is recommended that only one spell tome be purchased to match the power the player has, so that play balance and roleplaying do not suffer. 
  

Recommended Mods
================

- Live Another Life - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9557
- Portable camping gear mod of your choice.


Installation Requirements for Version 1.0
=========================================

Official Skyrim patch 1.4 or greater.

Download and install using one of the following methods.  

Installation - Nexus Mod Manager
================================

Use the \"Download with Manager\" button on the CM New Companions Mod page at Skyrim Nexus and activate after download. 


Installation - Wrye Bash BAIN
=============================

Drop the CMPowerSpells.esp into your Skyrim Mods\\Bash Installers folder, and then activate.


Installation - Manual
=====================

Drop the CMPowerSpells.esp and graphics folders into your Data folder.


Uninstall
=========

If you used a mod management program, use it to uninstall. Otherwise delete CMPowerSpells.esp and graphics facegendata files from the Data folder.  


Load Order
==========

Load order will not make any difference.


Incompatible Mods
=================

None.  


Known Issues
============

None.


Sources
=======

Bethesda Forum discussions: http://forums.bethsoft.com/forum/184-the-creation-kit/

The Creation Kit Wiki Tutorials - http://www.creationkit.com/Category:Tutorials

The Creation Kit - Steam download listed under Tools.
